titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5015) to provide drought assistance to agricultural producers, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-805.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 345 - 63 (Record Vote No: 246).

bill.summary: 7/27/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5015 (drought assistance).
